Cooperative Chance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Halfling, bard
Benefit: You can use your second chance power when an attack hits an ally within 10 squares of you. If the attack misses, you can slide that ally a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381, page(s) 82.
